New Records: Framber Valdez held the Kansas City Royals hitless through seven innings.
Jose Altuve hit a game-ending RBI double in the ninth inning.
Key Match Events: Jose Altuve's RBI double in the ninth inning to win the game.
Bobby Witt Jr. reached on an error and Paul DeJong hit a home run to tie the game in the ninth.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Framber Valdez's performance and Jose Altuve's clutch hit.
Alex Bregman was out of the lineup due to elbow soreness.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Framber Valdez had previously pitched a no-hitter in 2023.
The Astros had another no-hit bid into the eighth inning this week.
The Royals faced injuries to Vinnie Pasquantino and Lucas Erceg.
